content.detailedDescription:
Was awakened by light that eluminated my bedroom and partial of my mothers room also.
my mother came into my room when i had called out to her. we could not see what was directing this light beam into my room. only when it lessened it's brightness could we see shape of object. we both observed a craft hovering about 30 ft. above our road directly 500 fet west of our home. our bedrooms are on second floor of 2 story farm house. my mother ask me what i thought this was? the beam that was shining into our rooms was unlike any spot light i could recall. my mother asked me to call the sheriff, i could sense her uneasyness about what we were seeing and experiencing. the dispatcher asked me alot of questions as to what we were seeing.  i told her it hovered evenly above our road and seemed to land for maybe 4-5 minutes. i was repeating questions from dispatch to my mother since our phone was in hallway. sheriff said they were responding a couple cars asap. i hung up and went to window to watch craft. the beam seemed to stop but a rotating white light started up and then craft lifted vertically til out of sight. within 6 minutes several sheriff vehicles were on scene. they came to our door to tell us what they had found. nothing on roadway. a neighbor 1/2 mile north west also called in to so and said they saw a bright light  appearing to land somewhere south of them. 
this incident left our family nervous since it was a divorced mother with 3 children. 
was followed up later by another deputy later in the week in daylight. after reinterviewing me and me mother officer had nothing to go on. but said he believed us and he said he saw how scared we appeared.
 
main thing, is trying to explane the feeling from this light beam that came into my room and the affect on me and my mother.

mother was 34, myself 11,sister 10
content.summary: Was awakened from beam of light.Unlike any light here on earth and on how it made me feel.

content.detailedDescription:
During an overnight patrol, myself and close to 20 other marines came close to calling a security alert on an object, which was flying over restricted area. 

a mobile patrol unit of (2) marines first spotted the object ejecting what looked like sparks into the sky. the mobile unit immediately reported the sighting as a "rocket ship" to the alarm control center (acc) via coded radio. the acc responded to the mobile unit: "be advised, at ease on the net", asking the mobile unit to stop fooling around on the radio. the mobile unit immediately repeated the aforementioned sighting of a "rocket ship" and included the location of the sighting. i was also part of a mobile patrol unit and had also witnessed the earlier sighting. 

i however, didn't witness the object as a "rocket ship", because rockets leave a trail of smoke, flames, sound, and move at high speeds. this particular object made little to no sound. i could hear the faint crackling of the sparks, as the object slowly moved south. the sparks had the same duration and look of a common july 4th sparkler, just on a much larger scale. once i made a positive id on (the sighting) and not necessarily the craft, i followed up with a call to the acc corroborating the initial call from the other mobile patrol unit. i was instructed to contact the acc via landline to keep all chatter off of the radio. 

i stopped at an observation tower to call the acc. i described everything we are witnessing and also asked instructions, as the craft was in a no-fly zone and over a nuclear warhead limited area. the sergeant of the guard ordered us to standby as he called the installation commander and/or the navy. by this time, the object wasn't ejecting sparks, nor was it moving. it had changed direction and moved east just a bit and was stationary. the sparks had stopped flickering and something else was being ejected from the craft, but it was falling straight down.

the best way i can describe the substance falling from the object: plasma white molten lava. it appeared to fall all the way to the ground, but with the amount and density of the trees, i couldn't tell for certain. also.... the sighting seemed to change my perception on the scales of things. it seemed as if the white hot plasma was falling faster to the ground, than any earthly object would from that altitude. example: the object was (my best guess) a few hundred feet in the air, but the white plasma was falling as fast as a water drop from the spout into the sink. it was very weird and made me feel very small.

a group of us marines had gathered on the east end of the limited area to await instructions and maintain observation of the occurrence. the air was electric. static-like, is the best way i can describe it. no odor, and no sound of the white hot plasma falling through the trees. i thought it was odd, because of the size/amount that was falling. it could've been because of how bright the substance appeared to be...Making it seem bigger. i have no clue... it was very strange. the object made a noise, but it was more a feeling you can feel in your body... like an ultra low frequency hum or buzz.      

the object was never in clear view. we were able to track it by the sparks/white plasma it ejected and also the large shadow it cast in the cloud cover. although common with most ufo sightings, it didn't display any exterior lights whatsoever. we lost sight of the object once the white plasma stopped falling. we heard the low frequency hum for a few minutes afterwards but that stopped as well. also the air seemed to change as well. i could smell the ocean and it smelled very fresh.

the navy didn't respond until the next day. we never fired on the object because we couldn't identify it and it didn't seem to pose any immediate threat. the navy stated the following day, they were having an airshow, but i never believed it because of the time of the sighting and we are usually notified of any aircraft flying close to our location.

it is standard sop for marines to list all occurrences into a logbook. some did and some didn't. i was one of the marines that did. all logbooks are turned in to the platoon commanders, after the logbook is filled. that was the only evidence detailing the event.  

that same week, there was an aurora borealis which lasted into sunrise. it was a weird week. 

i decided to come forward about this sighting, as it may add some confirmation to someone else's sighting. i'm sorry i couldn't remember the exact date, but i never witnessed but one aurora borealis in 1994. the sighting happened that same week.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo spotted and documented by marines over a nuclear submarine base no-fly zone

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling home from the farm i worked on and noticed to the east how yellowish the moon looked and how big it seemed. it was almost like it was floating through the trees heading south. as i traveled south on scottville rd. after about four or five miles i kind of lost sight of it and didn't notice it again but as i turned east to head home (about two miles) i for some reason i don't remember i passed my house and turned north on the next dirt road. i headed up about 1/4 mile and saw a absolute white (seemed brighter then day light) light in the woods on the east side of the road down towards some water if i remember. the only thing i could think of was raccoon hunters because it was at night but couldn't wrap my head around the light. it lit up the entire area brighter than day but only in about a roughly 70 to 100 ft area and outside that area was pitch black. i really can't describe it but i knew something wasn't normal. it wasn't probably more than a few seconds passed and the light that was present in the woods started to raise from the ground amongst the trees. i didn't notice anything above the light but i'm not sure i looked up at all. i don't recall for sure but seemed the light was coming from ground level or i assumed that it was. now i when i say the light rose i don't mean a light as in the source( like a light bulb) but i mean the illumination was raising up. just the illuminated let's say 70 ft dia x 40 ft tall lit up area was raising like there was just a givin cubic footage of light without a source that i knew of. at this time i backed the truck up into the field on the west side of the road and headed back to the house. i pulled up the driveway and parked and got out and saw a blinking light headed straight for me. i was pretty frightened over this whole thing at this point and maybe that's why things get a bit both fuzzy and others as if it happened yesterday.  i saw the blinking light coming closer while i was standing in the driveway and as it got about at lets say 45 degrees to the north east it passed in front of a couple small white clouds and instantly saw the outline of a triangle with rounded points. now i'm not sure how but i also saw it at about 85 degrees to the south east from a location about 100 feet or so north of where i stood in the driveway. i can't explain how this can be but i recall both locations vividly as if it were yesterday. its from this last location that i saw clearly that it had a  yellow, green and red light at the corners and a white blinking light in the middle of the i assume the underside. from where i was standing in the driveway as soon as it passed in front of the cloud and i saw the shape i knew it was not a plane. at that split second it made a noise like wooomp and shot straight up and gone. our neighbor called the next day and wanted to talk to me but haven't talked to him to this day. i've had a half dozen or so sightings since then and a couple weird happenings before that happened. some with friends and a couple with my wife and son. there's more to tell but for that particular night i've explained it to the best of my ability and swear by every word as strange as it may be. honestly it feels pretty good to talk about it after all these years.
content.summary: Saw a ball of light when traveling home. thought it was the moon. saw it next in the woods. bright white light then witnessed it as a triangle

content.detailedDescription: I had just gotten home from working security at the fresno fair grounds at the directors hall.  i parked in my parking stall which was covered and lit.  i am a star gazer so i am constantly looking up at the sky and look at the planets.  i also gaze through my telescope so i know what stars and planets look like.  i locked my car and started walking looking up once i cleared the roof line of the parking stall and looked up to see the stars.  i noticed out to the left a very large light and it caught my eye so i stated looking at it.  from my vantage point the light was the size of a basketball hoop basket.  i noticed it moving very slowy just hovering there in the air roughly 800' above my head.  it then started moving again and i noticed that another light same size appeared until i saw six lights in total.  two lights about 1/4 of the way from the tip of the massive triangle shaped ufo, then half way another two lights spaced further apart at the width of the craft, then the last two lights at the rear of the craft appeared.  at first it just hung there making absolutely zero noise and no air movement around me while it was hovering above me.  all noises became silent, and i couldn't take my eyes off of it.  i decided to get my iphone out and see if i could possibly record it but i just couldn't get my mind to work enough to capture it on film.  the moment i took my phone out the craft started moving sideways almost like it was sliding sideways through the air from right above me sliding to the west and it started again hovering in place.  i started walking slowing towards the south and the craft starting moving south as well.  i unlocked my phone to call my wife to let her know i was home and parked then i noticed it started moving to the south but moving back towards me while moving south as well, again with the sliding movement.  definitely movement no airplane or jet or helicopter moves.  i grew up 28 years in the flight path of the airport about 4 miles from us and we always went out to see the military jets and other aircraft fly over.  i knew this was not anything the military routinely flies.  i dialed my wife's number and as i did that it started moving faster to the south so i started jogging after it.  as my wife answered the phone the massive triangle gained about 2000' of altitude in a split second and flew over some trees.  my wife answered the phone and asked why i sounded out of breath and i told her i was running watching a massive triangle ufo flying over the apartment right now and for her to go outside to confirm what i was looking at.  she was indisposed at the time but stayed on the phone so she knew i was safe the entire time.  as i watched the lights going through the trees as i was running under trees at this point i kept a visual on it.  again this was completely silent and i started being able to hear traffic once again and the wind blowing slightly.  i cleared the tree into open sky and saw it now probably 5 miles away from me now 3-4000' within another five seconds, then the lights on the bottom that i could see started getting brighter then in the blink of an eye it accelerated out of view.  if you literally blinked your eyes you would have missed it.  never made a single sound and went faster than anything i have ever noticed ever in my life.  from the back i could see that there was a dome like structure on the bottom of the rear of the massive triangle.  after it was out of sight i walked to the apartment unit we lived in at the time and my wife could tell i was sweaty from running after it and looked almost pale in the face with very wide eyes not able to blink.  i should also say this isn't the first experience i have had with ufos.  my wife and i have both witnessed three other ufos but not as in depth.  my wife asked what took me so long to get from the parking lot to the apartment and i said what do you mean it was only like 30-40 seconds and she told me no you were 10 minutes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I looked up and noticed six big white/amber lights and a dark triangle shape

content.detailedDescription: I came home from my daughters dance recital. i saw a skunk in my yard so i went outside to see it. i like to look at the stars as i sometimes see shooting stars. this was different. weird blinking and what looked like sparks shooting off of it. it followed a linear path at a steady speed what seemed slower then an airplane but way higher. i have never seen anything that i can compare with.
content.summary: Very erradic blinking and arc type light that shot off object at one point.

content.detailedDescription: I was just driving down the road and i saw this ship like thing in the sky.  the video has cursing in it i do apologize for that we were very scared. the video stopped recording on its own and before we could start it again the ship was gone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Large ship in sky

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed the orange orbs for the third time this year. it's as if it knows when i'm about to get a really good look at it, because it vanishes from sight each time i go inside my home to grab my telescope. the last 2 times i witnessed the orb, i was with other peers who can confirm the sighting and can confirm the orb disappeared from sight right before i got back outside to observe it with a telescope. all 3 sightings were at the same time of night and was moving in the same direction all 3 times. when i was alerted to come outside to "see this" by my parents, i instantly recognized it as the infamous orange orb. object had no sound. object seemed to be taking the path of a satellite in a low earth orbit, but satellites do not disappear or disintegrate right before your eyes. my father was the first to witness it on this occasion. said he saw it rise from the ground to the sky and followed it home in his truck where he alerted my mother and i to come ouside and look at it (was still very visible at this point). witnessed the object for about 60 seconds before i went inside to get telescope. my feelings were normal, that of amazement and curiosity. object seems to have a mind of it's own sometimes, (as if it can think or if it is being piloted by someone who can think or be aware that i am about to get a very very good close look at it). then again, maybe i am just over thinking. no pictures or videos available. it happens to suddenly for me to think of getting it on video. but i imagine this will not be the last time i see this thing, and next time i will be prepared.
content.summary: Cross referenced position of iss and have confirmed it was neither mars, venus or the iss. object much too bright and moving much too fast to be any of these

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of june 17th, i was returning home from walking my dog with a close friend when i saw a very bright round object in the sky above carson city. being close to the center of town it came from the north west and moved in a straight line towards the south west. when i asked my friend what he thought it could be we both agreed that it looks like a satellite. but we both agreed that it was way too low and bright to be possible without any sign of re-entry into the atmosphere and that it was on a path just like a plane. as it passed to our right side we could see that it was emitting light on all sides which planes and helicopters do not do. the object did not have blinking lights like conventional aircraft are required to have. we watched with much curiousity as it moved directly overhead making no noise at all and disappeared from our view behind some trees on our side of the street. having a small airport in town and reno-tahoe international airport close by it is everyday that we see all kinds of aircraft. also having a very particular interest in aviation i struggled to give any ideas as to what kind of aircraft it could be. i am submitting this information because i have an open mind and am looking forward to hearing if anyone has also reported a sighting in the same time frame. the sighting only lasted 1 minute and after 1 week i cannot stop thinking about it. i apologize for not being able to provide any pictures or video but in the moment i never thought of using my cell phone to try and do so. i also do not wish to take time away from more significant cases you may have but any response and guesses you may have will be appreciated. i sincerely hope that this report will help in any way and i personally hope we were not the only people to see this happen. i am somewhat familiar with mufon and the work your organization does and i thank you for taking the time to read this. i am available for a phone interview and you are welcome to call me on the number i have provided.
 

                                                thank you, -kurtis
content.summary: I observed a round craft that glowed brightly on all sides move in a straight line at a relatively low altitude move over the city.

content.detailedDescription:
i did not know who to send my information too  hoping i am in the right direction. thank you



here goes  i am 55 7/24/59. this all started when i was 4 yrs. old in 1963. i lived in barboursville, wv. one night we saw a light over the train tracks of our house. my dad was in the usaf during the korean war and we would sit outside on the porch and look for shooting stars. we saw this bright light and he thought it was a shooting star but all of the sudden it stopped and turned directions and came at our house. it stopped over our house but was too high to see what it was other than a bright light that changed colors. this was the first time, the next time i was 8 and my uncle was a major in the usaf stationed in coco beach fla. we would go on vacation and he would invite us to their house to watch the rocket shots that they would launch from there. we had been there quit awhile listening to the countdown was way cool at the age of 8. at about t minus  30 the countdown was interrupted. of course everyone was bummed out. when all of the sudden a bright light shot on to the launch area and we saw and heard jets taking off and flying toward the light. the light seemed to play with the jets for a few min. then just shot up into the sky. the launch was canceled and my uncle came home that night and of course we were asking him what had happened. he told us he could not tell us anything and to please never ask him about again. well we all knew what we had seen, he never invited us to come up to see that again and he told us that his commander had told all the military personal not to invite anyone again to see those shots. he  was a major  in the usaf with nassa. the next experience was when i was 14 we had moved up on a farm and i was out late at night ridding my motorcycle. all of the sudden i felt like someone was watching me i stopped my dirt bike and looked up in the sky and again i saw a bright light hovering over me. it made no noise just hovered over me it would make mind bending moves up down left right in high speed maneuvers knew it was not anything i had ever seen before. the next time i saw something i was in the usaf stationed at bentwaters/woodbridge in england. my duty station was on the woodbridge side and was next to the forest. for some reason that night i decided to go from our barracks back over to my duty station. i got on the bus that took you between the bases got off at the mess hall picked up a few sandwiches for the night shift and there was a short cut through the forest that we all always took. i saw these bright lights again and i started running to my duty station to tell anyone i could tell so i would know i was not going crazy. i got to my duty station and started telling the sgt. on duty and he told me he did not want to talk about what he had seen and if i knew what was good for me i would not tell anyone else about it either. someone came by our duty station and i could hear them telling him to keep his mouth shut about what he thought he had seen. they did not know i was there because i was not supposed to be there. he came inside and i asked him what all that was about and again he looked like he had seen a ghost and begged me not to mention it again. about 3 days later the sgt. left the base and no one would say where he went. they just said he was tdy and that we did not need to know. at the time the talk was we had a secret base in or around egypt and that is where he went. our afc was aero space ground equipment a glorified gas station attendant. i mentioned this to one of the osi personal on the base( wp) he asked me what i had seen. i told him and was sent to clovis nm a few days later under the endangered airman's act. i went from clovis to panama city fl. where again i saw a ufo i never told anyone about that sighting. it seemed like every 4 yrs. i would see one of these sightings. i have lost time a few different times. i think to this day i am being visited or something is going on with me. i will go to bed and have these awful dreams about being on a stretcher and having someone above me. although i don't feel scared of what they are doing to me i feel scared of what they look like. i keep hearing in my head how they will not hurt me and that i will not remember them being there. i can't say i really remember as it seems like a dream but the dream keeps happening over and over. it’s not a nightly dream but an every few years dream, but it is always the same dream. i can't explain it but it seems that i see these objects ever 4 to 5 years. i have always felt my luck changes and my life seems to equal out in that time. i have never told anyone about this and hesitate to tell you all about it, but i have to tell someone. thanks mark  g.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I feel these events are happening.

content.detailedDescription:
Back in around 1974 thereabouts after retirement and living in government canyon and sitting in a lazy boy chair a ufo came up from behind a mountain and went south at a speed i calculated at 6000 mph in less than two and a half seconds and that means they had to have inertial dampening or a person would have been a greasy spot on one side of the ufo. the next day it came up from beyond the same mountain and headed south east and same speed and showed no signs of propulsion did not make any sound such as breaking the sound barrier, no protrusions showing such as a cockpit, was a grayish gun metal color and did not reflect light as a shiny object would. one wold have had to be looking at the place it came up from or else one would not see it as it gores so fast and if one looked away and back it would be gone. like a bowl put together with a flange all the way around it but the rest was smooth.

they are here and have been most likely for perhaps billions of years and i  say that because objects were found in africa, metal balls with groves around the equatorial region and they date back in time of 2.8 billion years! so many anomalies everywhere that cannot be explained otherwise!


another incident that happened to me was in a safeway store and a at least seven foot tall man was talking to a cashier that had angered me at another time and i had detrimental thoughts about her and then turned my thoughts to the man and he had a long wool black coat on as it was winter time and my thought was i wonder if he is one of the men in black and have no idea why i had that thought but when i kept walking and got even with that aisle my right arm went up into the air and i did a military right face and he was looking down his nose at me. i looked him up and down a couple of times and he was wearing a tuxedo and had on a red cummerbund and wearing a light blue shirt with the frilly stuff down the middle and he looked a bit like parnell roberts but wasn't him of course. the only thing i thought later was that he had read my thoughts and caused me to face him because he wanted a look at me. i just wish i had thought that at the time and would have requested to get acquainted, because if he was as i later thought, from some where else in our universe i sure would have liked to talk with him.

i am 89 years old now but was a combat aircrewman and i see them call foo fightersa as if a french word and the they told us it was flying object observed. te pilots saw them a lot then in 1944.
content.summary: Came from a area w/ power lines

content.detailedDescription: We were poolside, at the beach of all places, escaping the crowd on the beach. i was watching a plane that afternoon, with skydivers in it, make repeated drops that afternoon. when a few moments after watching parachutes make their decents, i noticed a patch of sky se of town that was strange because it looked like something  moving toward my location. kind of smokey not really, with a wobble like commotion of speed.  a gold, domed disk shaped craft was wobbling at a tremendous speed  overhead. i could make out some bulbous formation underneath the craft as it passed, glimmering in the sunlight.  i watched it move in a nw direction, the whole incident lasted 20- 30 seconds. i was the only one who witnessed it.
content.summary: Witnessed a metallic craft wobble as it flew past my location at very high rate of speed form a se direction toward nw

content.detailedDescription: Myself and my 2 sisters were outside our childhood home with our father looking through a telescope at the moon, as we waited for our turn we looked around the sky and one of us spotted an object going back and forth between 2 stars long enough for all of us to look in right spot with naked eye, but we all saw this and just talked about it 6-15-15 and they both remember it like it was yesterday! my fathers memory is a little fuzzy now that he is older, we talked about it on father's day! if i was to stand in the same spot as i did back in 79, i know i can show what i call is a wormhole! that is the only explanation in my opinion! my sisters are more than happy to talk with you if needed? i look forward to hearing from you guys!
content.summary: In my opinion a wormhole was witnessed by 3 people, myself and 2 sisters! i can show what 2 stars it was!

content.detailedDescription: I was at home, it was close to sundown. after playing in backyard i was laying on my back in the grass and had been watching these tall clouds that developed to the east of town. the sunset had turned them into a magnificent cloud formations,  anyway i notice at the top of one of these clouds, there was an orb. it made figure of 8's, in and out of the cloud top. it could have been  20,00 ft up and 6-8 mi. away. i thought it was kite, we had always flown them as kids. i watched it for fifteen minutes at least, could not take my eyes off it. it was far away my eyes couldn't focus on it after awhile moving in and out of the cloud. ive never stopped replaying that moment in my head, i'll never forget it.
content.summary: White orb making figure eights, in and out of a cloud top, observed it for 15 minute maybe more

content.detailedDescription: I had returned from a baseball game in cleveland on june 22nd.  we live approx. 85 mi. sw of cleveland in a very rural area.  winds were blowing from west to east but we had a starlit sky with constellations visible.  when exiting my car in the driveway, i noted a bright white light shrouded in a mist high overhead.  there was no discernible shape against the night sky.  i called my daughter to the door to witness the object.  it remained stationary for a few moments before continuing from south to magnetic north over se ashland county, ohio.  the object appeared very bright in the sky while stationary above our property but dimmed as it moved northward.  the object remained visible for about 7 minutes until it was obscured by our tree line to the north.  i was most impressed with its use of the property of light.  i have witnessed the iss, helicopters, passenger jets, air force 1, wwii fighters and bombers, dc-7s, soyuz, space shuttles, sputnik, echo, and everything imaginable.  i am 66 years old and a retired teacher of 35 years with an med. in talented & gifted educ.  i am fortunate that my daughter and i witnessed this spectacle.
content.summary: Object appeared directly overhead.  i thought it was a comet because it had a white light shrouded in a fog.  no clouds that night.  object moved from south to magnetic north.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching a storm
content.summary: I can;t.

content.detailedDescription: On tuesday evening on june 23, 2015 my brother was at walmart in islandia, ny. he went outside around 8:30pm and started taking pictures with his cell phone at the evening sky. there was severe thunderstorm happening and the sky was changing colors. when he observed his pictures, he noticed something in one of the photos. three orb like shaped crafts, purple in color. also, when you zoom in on the picture, you can see a silhouette of a triangle shape around the orbs.
content.summary: During severe weather, took picture and objects were seen in foto.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog, as per usual.  the sky was blue, with a few cumulous clouds.  i've never observed a star during the day (many planes and sometimes the moon, but not clouds). what was perplexing was that when the cloud gradually made its way toward the object, the object was even brighter through the clouds. the cloud passed, and the object remained, no bigger, no smaller and in the same position. the object disappeared after 2 minutes.  i looked elsewhere and it was gone.  i'm doubtful that it was a plane as the location/altitude did not change and the size was constant.  it's not there today. i feel somewhat silly reporting it, but maybe someone else saw it too.
content.summary: Star like object, still in daylight sky

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo sighting on june 22, 2015 in sedona, arizona at approx. 10:00 p.M.
filed by melinda leslie, director of ufo sighting tours, sedona, arizona

at approximately 10:00 p.M., or just before, my 6 clients and i (7 people total) were out on a ufo sighting tour with military night vision goggles when we all saw 2 large amber colored triangle shape, hard edge, structured objects with our naked eyes.  these traveled from the northwest area of the sky beyond airport mesa in a southward direction toward cathedral rock.  the 7 witnesses were standing together on chavez ranch road turnout area.  the 2 triangle objects then made an arching turn as they headed easterly toward the chapel of the holy cross area and then disappeared to the north over munds mountain.   all witnesses were absolutely astonished and continued to discuss the sighting event for the duration of the tour.

4 of the witnesses clearly saw that these were 2 distinct structured, hard edged, dark triangle shaped craft each with 3 amber or orange colored lights on the bottom, one light at each corner.   both craft were seen by the 4 witnesses with their naked eyes, without the use of the night vision goggles.  2 other witnesses saw them at close range but initially thru the goggles and could not make out the shape, only that they were huge bright lights.  one of these witnesses is a retired airline pilot with over 40 years of professional experience.  he stated emphatically that these 2 objects were remarkably faster than any plane he’d ever seen and that they were very low, much lower than commercial aircraft.  when these 2 witnesses lowered their goggles during the sighting, they and i together saw that these were 2 very large amber colored lights, but unfortunately we did not see the distinct triangle shapes, each with 3 lights in their corners, as did my other 4 clients.  all 7 of us did see the 2 objects make an arched turn while banking and continued to watch them as they disappeared over munds mountain in the distance.  please see the diagram below.

additionally, when these 2 craft were on initial approach, at the same time, a military jet at very high altitude passed over us and then another one did again as these 2 objects headed northeast.  all 7 witnesses commented that the 2 ufos were considerably lower than either of the 2 jets.  while we had no way of knowing if the 2 military jets were in pursuit of the ufos, their flight path was towards the approach of the 2 unknown objects.  it is difficult to judge the distance of the unknown objects from us, but all the witnesses expressed that the ufos were at most a few thousand feet, or less above us.  all 6 clients expressed that they are willing to be interviewed and contact information can be provided.

unfortunately we were all caught up in the sighting and no photos or videos were achieved.  darn it!  better luck next time.  i have a computer diagram of the event, but i am unable to place diagram of sighting with this text.  i would like to provide diagram with my report.  if able to attach later, please see attached.
content.summary: 2 amber triangular shaped craft flying in unison making an arching turn

content.detailedDescription:
Mufon hq field investigator l.F. filled out this report with witness over the phone.  6/24/2015
_______________________________________________________________________
witness has seen this very bright star for 11 1/2 years,it has lights like headlights around it. he has seen the light ever since he moved into his house. it is always in the sky and stays in a stationary orbit. he looked at it with binoculars and saw a white circle with round headlights around it. he can see colors of red and yellow and orange through the binoculars. he also saw a very small white dot like object moving around, the circle with lights, like it was coming and going. the light appears to be spinning. he sees this light almost straight up in the sky, and towards the south. he says he is 30 miles outside of chicago so the sky is not pitch black and still he has no problem seeing the light. it moves with the rotation of the earth and he can watch it for hours. he doesn't know if it's the space station or a satellite or something else.
content.summary: Witness has seen this very bright star for 11 1/2 years, it has lights like headlights around it.

content.detailedDescription:
Mufon hq. field investigator l.F. filled out this report with witness on the phone. 6/24/2015
_________________________________________________________________________

in the summer of 1985 my friend and i saw a white star that was larger than normal. then it moved and stopped and moved again. it then started getting bigger and bigger and pulsating.  we then heard a very loud click, like a toggle switch being flipped. everyone in the neighborhood heard it and came outside. we got scared and ran into the house. it was reported in the newspapers the next day.
i saw your tv show and thought i should share my experience.
content.summary: In the summer of 1985 my friend and i saw a star that was larger than normal

content.detailedDescription:
I have terminal liver disease and have never told anyone this since we tried to tell our parents and got laughed out of the room. my sister and my cousin viky and i were laying on the haystack just looking at the stars and i saw 2 points of light moving towards each other. then they started shooting  like sparks at each other. as they approached each other the one coming from the right sank under the one from the left. they passed each other that way and the lower one then shot a spark back at the other one  , it flashed and was gone and the one that was left disappeared. we went running in the house to tell our parents and they haw hawed us and wouldn't even listen . i recently asked my sister about it and she admitted that she did not see what viky and i saw but wanted to be part of the group. i have never spoken of it to my cousin since that night so i don't really know if she actually saw it or was just humoring the crazy guy. a few days later i was riding my bike on m rd going west and i saw what i thought was a large red orb like thing it seemed pretty big  but i wanted to see if i could get closer. it seemed to be about 1/2 mile away. it was descending toward the ground so i was sure i would be able to get to it and see what in the world it was. i rode a half mile towards it and the mountains were about 2 more miles away , then i realized this thing was gigantic as it went behind the mountains down toward moab, utah or the four corners area. ive never spoken of these things because i figured they would think i was crazy and who knows what they would do to me then, but at this point i have very little time left and there is nothing to be afraid of anymore .Just wanted to tell someone before i pass on. thank you for your studies and all the things you do to show this as the reality it is .


                                               gratefully yours, wade
content.summary: Two strar like ufos shooting spaks at each other moving towards one another one sinks below as they pass and shoots backwards and the other flashes and diappears

content.detailedDescription:
Mufon hq field investigator l.F.Filled out report with witness over the phone 6/24/2015
________________________________________________________________________
in 1985 my friend and i were outside in the summer evening when we saw a star that was bigger than normal. it was white and moved in the sky and then stopped and then moved again. it started pulsating and getting bigger and bigger. we then heard a very loud click noise, like a toggle switch.  everyone in the neighborhood heard it. we got scared and ran in the house.
it was in the newspapers the next day.
i saw your program on tv and decided to tell you about my experience.
content.summary: In 1985 my friend and i were outside in the summer evening when we saw a star that was bigger than normal

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on balcony, went inside, turned to close sliding glass door.
looking west a very black well described rectangular craft with small triangular points. in a beautiful sunny day blue sky at an angle, object drops down behind a tree, very close (out stretched arm the size of my thumb nail) the actual sighting lasted under a second, but it was so defined and amazing. no sound.
i thought right away that is no helicopter (they some times fly right over head on way to hospital) it was so defined and so close i have to believe it was an ufo.
i was shocked,excited,amazed, i have watched the sky my entire life, lots of fun lights and mind tricks, but nothing like a beautiful sunny day object sighting!
dropped behind tree.

i request that i work with "greg smith" i know him personally, i am comfortable talking to him. he is a mufon field investigator in my very close proximity...
content.summary: Rectangular with 3-4 small triangular appendices very black with distinct outline

content.detailedDescription: One evening in tuscon my husband and i were sitting on the next door neighbors front steps talking when our attention was caught by these three white lights in the sky that were chasing each other around, they seemed to be glowing white and were round in shape and we called our neighbors outside to witness it.  the objects were really high up so we could not hear if they made any sound. we all thought we were seeing ufos. two would hover and one would go straight up fast and come back down to the others. we watched for several minutes as they traveled over this one area, and then several airforce jets came roaring through the sky towards the objects.  when this happened the objects took off extremely fast straight up and disappeared and we did not see them come back. i searched the newspapers and the news reports for any mention of the sighting, but there was nothing.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Viewed three glowing objects high in sky.  watched as changed direction several times. when airforce planes came the object went straight up really fast and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i took a friend for a drive. as we were coming up upon his driveway i look to the left and said do u see that ufo!? my boyfriend  said yes the man in passenger seat said yes and turned away from it. which i thought was strange. we stayed  at bottom of drive way for  at least 8 mins and the object did not move. so we drove up to his house and i could no longer se it from where we were. couldn't say what i seen but it was blinding.Looked like basketball size with eyes but golf ball size thru camera.It was stationary the whole time we were watching it. i felt very excited and a lil nervous .
content.summary: It was so bright it burned your eyes. it was like looking at the sun.It looked to be over the mississippi river.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on a small dock on the homewood shore of lake tahoe.Just looking at the lake and the mountains in the distance.There were distance clouds over the southern part of the mountains, also an off shore cloud layer moving across the lake in a northern direction. i felt overwhelming urge to look to my right and i noticed a bright flash over the mountain range that appeared to be a sunlight reflection off metal. the shine continued as i looked at it and i could perceived that the object was moving very fast. i felt a sense of elation as i watched the object and i could tell it was coming towards me. i assumed it was a passenger jet but as it came towards me i could tell it was moving much to fast to be a passenger jet. i then thought it could be a small fighter jet perhaps heading towards fallon afb in nevada. the distance it was covering while traveling towards me did not seem possible for anything other the a very fast jet. as it came closer i felt a rush of excitement as if the object was trying to get my attention. i could tell the object was slowing as it got within about a half mile from me. it was traveling below a cloud deck and i could see that it was a silver sphere. i could see a sailboat with a gentleman looking up towards the object and as the object passed in front of me it suddenly veered to its'left, sped up and within a couple of seconds was no longer visible to me. the object reminded me of a sphere you would see on top of a flag pole except its' diameter was a little smaller than the length of a small private airplane. it made no sound but it did seem to slightly disturb the cloud layer above it, but i can not be sure because it happen so quickly. i then ran to the bar/restaurant, sunnyside resort, where i was employed, which was less than 1/2 mile from where i was seated. i was sure that when i arrived there i would be able to share what i saw with others who were on the deck , in the bar which had large windows facing the lake or on our dock. as i entered the establishment i expected people to be excited but everything seemed normal. i then asked a friend of mine who was the bartender on shift if anyone had seen anything strange fly past the resort. he stated no. i described what i had seen and he laughed telling me that it is not uncommon for the locals to report seeing things like that happening in lake tahoe. i then went out on the deck and dock area and was surprised that everything seemed normal. i checked news reports that day and the local papers the next day fully expecting news of the object but there was nothing of note. several years ago i decided to research ufo sightings in the area of lake tahoe during that time. i found only one report and it was nothing like what i had seen.
content.summary: Saw metallic reflection over mountain range. moving quickly at great distance. passed over lake below an off-shore cloud cover. change direction while in front of me.

content.detailedDescription: At about 9:45 pm i was leaving the equestrian riding arena on my horse i heard a humming noise and looked towards the sound . to my surprise i saw a huge triangular object with three blue - green lights on each corner along with one red light on one of the corners. the object was moving so slow that i could see the underside which was all black but much darker then the night sky. i yelled for my husband to look at what i was seeing and the few feet from where i was to where my husband was the object just disappear it was completely gone! i wanted to add that i noticed several helicopters.
content.summary: I heard a " humming " i then looked up in the direction of the sound and saw a huge triangle object with three blue green lights on each corner with a bright red light on the left corner.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my driveway and began to see the object almost overhead moved w in a slow steady straight path, then the lighted object just disappeared like it was on like a light then was off.  looked for wing lights to see if airplane but circle much larger than nose light on a plane and no wing lights.  excited, curious
content.summary: Round in shape, large, bright yellow glow

content.detailedDescription: I was part of a group of children going to echo lake to spend the day. we were walking along the dirt road leading to the lake, i was ahead of everyone else, as i came out from the canopy of trees i looked up and saw this object sitting in mid air above the lake. i called to my companions to hurry to come and see it. before they could come out from the cover of tree, it sounded like a motor started up and the object dipped down, rose up, flew over the trees to the left and disappeared. the object looked like a black ball that had been cut in half, flat across the bottom and dome shaped on top. it was a matte black and had no shine to it. i was only 8 years old and since i was the only one that saw it, i never told anyone about it until i was 50 years old and people started to talk about seeing ufo's.
content.summary: I spotted the object suspended over the lake it didn't make a sound. oi called to my friends to come and look at this but before they could come and see it, a motor started upn, it dipped down and flew over the tree tops and dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was spending the night at my friend's house and at around eleven thirty, midnight we walked outside. we were dancing to the ghostbuster's song when we went to her aunt's car and sat on the roof of the car. we were sitting there staring at the sky for about five minutes when i started hearing a buzzing noise. i tapped my friend on the arm and she looked around with me. we walked around her yard a couple times then went back to the car. the buzzing noise was still there and i looked at the sky again and there was an orange light off in the distance. i stared at it for about five to ten minutes and then it started to kind of pulsate. i tapped on my friend's shoulder and she looked over to where i was staring at. she saw the light pulsating and she started to freak out. we got up to walk around and to get our mind off of it. i thought it was just an airplane but it wasn't moving at all. when we finally sat down again the orange circle looked like it had gotten closer because it looked bigger. it started pulsating a little faster and it had gotten brighter. i was really freaked out by now and so was my friend. we were so freaked out that we got into the back of the car and just stared at it. it looked like it was getting closer and then it just disappeared. my friend and i sat in the car maybe an hour after it had happened just thinking about what it was. she just said that it was probably a plane or something like that. i think if it was a plane it would have moved while we watched it. the stars moved but it did not! after about another hour we had gotten out of the car and went inside. while we were walking i looked at the sky and the orange circle was nowhere to be found. the buzzing we heard stopped about 5 minutes before the light disappeared. all together it lasted maybe a half an hour to an hour. i am a minor, my step-mother said it was alright to talk to you
content.summary: My friend and i saw a light orange light appear then disappear
